articles.author: Gerren Keith Gaynor
articles.title: Coronavirus cases on quarantined Diamond Princess cruise ship rise, include American
articles.description: Two more passengers have reportedly been diagnosed with coronavirus.
articles.content:
Two more passengers have reportedly been diagnosed with coronavirus aboard the Princess Diamond cruise ship that is quarantined off the coast of Japan, bringing the total number of cases to 63.
One of the new cases involved is an American, increasing the shi… [+1986 chars]

articles.title: Dr. Robert Siegel: Coronavirus epidemic could be contained in months – Global pandemic unlikely
articles.description: No one knows for sure how long the Wuhan coronavirus epidemic in China will last and how seriously it will impact other countries, but there are encouraging signs that suggest the epidemic will be contained in several months.
articles.content:

articles.title: Diamond Princess passenger tweets food reviews during coronavirus quarantine
articles.description: This is one way to cope amid a deadly virus outbreak aboard.
articles.content:
Despite being quarantined for days on the coast of Japan due to the coronavirus, one cheery Diamond Princess cruise passenger is making the best of his time.

articles.author: Julia Musto
articles.title: Dr. Marc Siegel: No need to panic about coronavirus in US
articles.description: Americans are worrying more about the coronavirus than they should be, Fox News Medical contributor Dr. Marc Siegel said Saturday.
articles.content:
Americans have no reason to panic over the coronavirus, Fox News medical correspondent Dr. Marc Siegel said Saturday.
"People are walking down the street with masks about a virus that literally only has infected 12 people" in the United States, he said.
Sie… [+1489 chars]

articles.title: Sen. Tom Cotton: Eliminating coronavirus requires Chinese Communist Party to make big changes
articles.description: We still have a chance to prevent coronavirus from becoming an epidemic in America, and even a narrow shot at heading off a pandemic. Achieving this will require drastic changes from the Chinese Communist Party, whose secrecy and paranoia are responsible for …
articles.content:
China has been hobbled by the mysterious coronavirus that emerged in the central city of Wuhan late last year. The ruling Chinese Communist Party is now taking aggressive measures to regain control of the situation.

articles.author: Brie Stimson
articles.title: First American dies of coronavirus in China: US embassy
articles.description: A 60-year-old diagnosed with coronavirus in Wuhan, China, has reportedly become the first U.S. citizen to die of the novel virus.
articles.content:
A 60-year-old diagnosed with coronavirus in Wuhan, China, has reportedly become the first U.S. citizen to die of the novel virus.
The patient died at Jinyintian Hospital in Wuhan on Thursday, The New York Times reported.
The U.S. Embassy in Beijing confirme… [+1285 chars]

articles.title: Coronavirus deaths in China grow to 772, more than 34,500 cases reported
articles.description: China increased its death toll from the coronavirus Friday to 722, adding that news cases jumped to 31,774, according to reports.
articles.content:

articles.title: Norwegian Cruise enforcing travel restrictions due to coronavirus outbreak
articles.description: The cruise line, citing guidance from the World Health Organization and the CDC, is prohibiting anyone who holding a Chinese, Hong Kong or Macau passport from boarding its ships, regardless of residency.
articles.content:
Norwegian Cruise Line announced on Friday major travel restrictions for passengers and crew members amid the coronavirus outbreak.
